Articles.Content:
So I just bought this game for 27 bucks only to realize I can't see half the menu and thus cannot play the game. I'm using an old Magnavox television as well, which doesn't have the option in its menu to change the zoom. I don't know why a manufacturer wouldn't add that option on their t.v., you'd think that would be very important. Anyway. 

 

Guys is there a way to expand the margins in this game so I can see the menu screen properly? I'm playing Xbox and I do not currently see an option in the game to expand the zoom so I can actually play this game. Thanks. 

By the way I have seen people suggest there is this arrow at the top left screen or whatever but this option doesn't exist and if it did, I can't access it because I cannot see it.
By 'zoom', do you mean the aspect ratio?

Yeah I think this has been changed since last patch from aspect ratio to Overscan I believe. Go to space centre go to options and it should be right at the bottom. 

Hope this helps
